segments.text: We still have an important attraction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The place is a must-see . This zoo was built in 1862 , and it's the oldest zoo in the world , and still among the best . There are more than 3,000 species of animals here , including the popular kangaroos , wallabies , koalas , and wombats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most animals are not locked up in tiny cages . Rather , they are set in almost natural surroundings or well-tended gardens .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I'm sure you will like it .
segments.speaker: S1
